revision.text: Possibly: A Vindication of the Defence of Christianity from the Prophecies of the Old Testament. In an Answer to the Scheme of Literal Prophecy Considered. By the Right Reverend Father in God Edward, Ld. Bishop of Coventry and Lichfield. In Two Volumes, by Edward Chandler. (London : Printed for James and John Knapton, at the Crown in St. Paul's Church-Yard, MDCCXXVIII. [1728]) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2409608~S1
